fields.description: APSHTTPClient should provide detailed comments in pull requests. A PR should be considered as a request for admission, not a right or demand of entrance. Dress nicely, look your best, knock politely, introduce yourself, explain why you would like to come inside and be a part of the family, be respectful and prove your worthiness.
fields.summary: iOS: APSHTTPClient should provide detailed comments in pull requests.
